title: Nee Pathi Naan Pathi Kanne Lyrics Keladi Kanmani
stanzas: <div>Nee Pathi Naan Pathi Kanne Lyrics Keladi Kanmani

Nee paadhi
naan paadhi kanne
arugil nee indri
thoongaadhu kannae

Nee paadhi
naan paadhi kannaa
arugil nee indri
thoongaadhu kannae

manjal manakkum
en netril vaitha
pottukoru artham irukkum
unnalae..

mella sirikkum
un muththu nagai
raththinathai alli thelikkum
munnaale

iruttil kooda
irukkum nizhal naan
irudhi varaikkum
thorandhu varuven

sorgam edharkku
en ponnulagam
pennuruvil pakkam irukku
kannae vaa

Nee paadhi
naan paadhi kannaa
arugil nee indri
thoongaadhu kannae

naan paadhi kanne
